title: IRenderMaterial.NSamples
description: Gets or sets the number of samples used to calculate the contribution of the glossy component for illuminating the appearance.
returns: Number of samples used to calculate the contribution of the glossy component
remarks: Increasing the sampling rate reduces artifacts but reduces performance. This property is available when the type of material is Satin Finish, Accurate reflections is selected, and Glossy is non-zero.
